overview.en: KMT is a traceable encrypted digital currency for distributed intelligent contracts based on the underlying technology of block chains. It aims to build a brand-new business model of block chains with the main body of China-Africa trade block chains.
overview.zh: KMT是基与区块链底层技术构建的分布式智能合约的可溯源的加密数字货币，旨在构建中非贸易区块链为主体的全新区块链商业模式。
